alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 02 at 11:15PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Heavy snow will impact portions of southeastern Clinton, northeastern Essex, Lamoille, northwestern Orleans, north central Addison, south central Grand Isle, Chittenden, northwestern Washington and central Franklin Counties through MIDNIGHT EST... At 1115 PM EST, heavy snow was reported along a line extending from near Enosburg Falls Village to near Milton to near Keeseville. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds 35 mph or greater, and visibility less than a mile. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and will blow around unsecured objects. Low visibility may pose a hazard to motorists. Locations impacted include... Essex Junction, Newport City, South Burlington, Burlington International Airport, Burlington, Willsboro, Morrisville, Enosburg Falls, Johnson Village, Jay, Newport Town, Jay In Franklin County, Cambridge, Winooski, Montgomery Center, Westford, Hyde Park, Montgomery, Colchester and Essex Junction Village. This includes the following highways... Interstate 87 between mile markers 130 and 137. Interstate 89 between mile markers 70 and 104, and between mile markers 107 and 108.
info.instruction: Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Western Essex
